name: Noir se Trouve
description:
P.I. Logan Locke has been hired to find a missing person. His leads have converged onto a condemned apartment building. Nothing seems out of the ordinary, except for a bloodstain on the steps and flickering light dancing through one of the broken top floor windows... 

Outmaneuver your own shadows to piece together a chilling mystery!

#

Introducing Jarret Barton as Logan Locke

Narrative and Level Designer: Jarret Barton

Game Designer/Composer: Gregory Blomquist

Programmer/Voice Over Producer: Cory Rupert

Art Direction/Programmer: Richard Semenuik
